page.title: 03RAF Neatishead & N'head Hall
page.content:
06340318 RAF NEATISHEAD The area is dominated by the radar tracking station and the barbed wire fences of this RAF site. The surrounding fields are arable. The landscape is flat with no hedging and few trees.
06350318 NEATISHEAD HALL Neatishead Hall Farm is the last remaining dairy farm in the area. The stock is Friesian Pedigree Registered Neatishall Herd. The milk is taken in a bulk milk tanker direct to the Milk Marketing Board. The surrounding area intensively managed pasture. To the south, rough marsh for pheasant cover
